parameters.name: All
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to remove all tags. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

Default value: **false**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the resources reside. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of resource N. Valid values of N: **1** to **50**.

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The key of tag N to remove from the resource. Valid values of N: **1** to **20**.
